about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Antioch: Scarlet Bay, a new online co-op narrative detective game developed by Midnight Mood Studio.

You play as one of two detectives in this neo-noir thriller working together to solve an intriguing murder in the city of Antioch, a dark metropolis surrounded by mountains and sea. Will you catch the killer and bring the victim the justice she deserves?

The soundtrack aims to take the listener on a journey deep into the heart of the neon-drenched city of Antioch. It combines the genres of 'synthwave' and 'jazz noir' along with layering in various sounds of the city using field recordings and cinematic influence to create a unique soundworld for the game that takes inspiration from both 80s synthwave/pop and the jazz music of 1940s film noir.

Recorded on various synths/piano and featuring Mike LeSirge on saxophone and Ani Matevos as vocalist/lyricist on the end credits song 'City of Tears'.

Music composed, recorded and produced by Alex Burnett
